abstract.description: The detailed description of a document.

agencyAcronym.description: An abbreviation of the agency name.

agencyName.description: Full name of the Federal Agency.

allowLateComment.description: Some agencies will accept comments after the due date.

attachmentCount.description: Number of attachments associated with a document.

attachments.description: Additional files associated with this document

cfr.description: A Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) Citation Number exists for each regulation referring to the rules published in the Federal Register by executive departments and agencies of the Federal Government.

comment.description: The text of the submitter's comment.

commentDueDate.description: Date and time when the period for the public to comment ends.

commentStartDate.description: Date and time when the period for the public to comment begins.

docketId.description: A unique identifier established for a docket.

docketType.description: A Docket Type is either Rulemaking or Nonrulemaking. A Rulemaking docket includes the type of regulation that establishes a rule. While a Nonrulemaking docket does not include a rule.

documentId.description: A unique identifier established for a document.

documentStatus.description: Identifies whether the document is Posted on or Withdrawn from Regulations.gov.

documentSubtype.description: A secondary classification of a document.

documentType.description: A primary classification of a document.

effectiveDate.description: The date, specified in the Federal Register, when a rule takes effect and is enforced.

federalRegisterNumber.description: The unique identifier of a document from the Federal Register (example FR Doc. E6-540).

fileFormats.description: Formats of the document, included as URLs to download from the API

openForComment.description: The document is open for Comment. This value is recalculated daily based on the comment end date. If allowLateComment is true, then the comment remains open indefinitely.

pageCount.description: The number of pages in the document.

postedDate.description: The date a document was posted to Regulations.gov and made available for public view and comment.

receivedDate.description: For a comment submitted through Regulations.gov, this marks the date a comment is submitted by the commenter.

rin.description: The Regulation Identifier Number (RIN) assigned to each regulation which allows it to be cross-referenced with the Regulatory Agenda.

startEndPage.description: The first and last page numbers of the document.

title.description: The formal title of the document.
